job.jobname: EG: Test Transferorder - weight on invoice

step.datasource: SELECT t.hid as HeaderID , t.itemcode AS artcode , sum(t.quantity) as esr_aantal , linereferenceid AS ReferenceID , linereferenceid as field01 -- Wordt gebruikt om te controleren of de betreffende regel terug te vinden is in de database --, CAST(sum(t.NetWeight) as decimal(15,2)) as gewicht_bi -- Added 210119 LVE FROM [dbo].[_AB_tb_TransfersOrders] AS t WITH(nolock) WHERE 1=1 --AND t.runid = '%runid%' --AND t.seqno = 130 --AND t.rowstatus = 1 -- Test AND t.itemcode != '0174000' -- doesn't exist in test AND t.hid IN (%param_hids%) group by t.hid, t.itemcode, linereferenceid
step.stepname: Create sales order (set target to Globe)

step.datasource:
SELECT t.hid as HeaderID , '997354' as debnr , RIGHT(CONCAT('Transfer USA ', t.hid), 20) as refer , t.hid as refer1 --, CONCAT('Transfer USA ', t.hid) as docnumber --, ISNULL(t.purchase_ordernr, 'PO unknown') as docnumber , LEFT(CONCAT('po:',ISNULL(t.purchase_ordernr, 'unknown'), ' - rq:', t.hid),30) as docnumber , '60' as magcode , orderreferenceid AS ReferenceID , orderreferenceid AS Freefield3 -- Gebruikt voor het terugzoeken van het InkoopOrdernr , 1 as isuseadditionalfields --, SUM(NetWeight) as netto_gew --, SUM(NetWeight) as bruto_gew FROM [dbo].[_AB_tb_TransfersOrders] AS t WITH(nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 --AND t.runid = '%runid%' --AND t.seqno = 130 --AND t.rowstatus = 1 -- Test AND t.hid IN (%param_hids%)
GROUP BY t.hid, t.purchase_ordernr, orderreferenceid
step.stepname: Create sales order - Header (set target to Globe)

step.datasource:
SELECT TOP (10) r.ordernr as HeaderID, t.ItemCode as artcode, t.quantity as esr_aantal, r.ID, t.ItemNumber as serie_num FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) -- Get the first orderline we can use to deliver this CROSS APPLY ( SELECT TOP (1) r.ordernr, r.ID FROM [100].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND r.ordernr = '12100079' --t.sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND r.artcode = t.ItemCode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND r.uitgifte = 0 -- Not delivered yet ORDER BY r.regel ) r WHERE 1=1 --AND t.runid1 = '%runid%' --AND t.rowstatus1 = 1
-- Test AND t.hid IN (%param_hids%) ORDER BY t.ItemNumber
step.stepname: SDK Fulfillment Line (set target to Globe)

step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT k.ordernr as HeaderID, k.ordernr as ordernr , 1 as InvoiceGenerate -- Generate invoice , k.magcode , 2 as PrintDestination -- Don't print , 'PAKBON' as PrintLayout FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [100].dbo.orkrg k WITH (NOLOCK) ON k.ordernr = '12100079'-- t.sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND k.ord_soort = 'V' AND k.afgehandld = 0 WHERE 1=1 --AND t.runid1 = '%runid%' --AND t.rowstatus1 = 1 -- Test AND t.hid IN (%param_hids%)
step.stepname: SDK Fulfillment Header (set target to Globe)
